main event: On May 10, 1952, several civilians in Ellenton, South Carolina observed a yellow disc-shaped object during a UFO sighting.
interesting points: The UFO was described as disc-shaped and yellow in color,The object was observed moving straight and level, witnesses thought some objects might be balloons or aircraft but couldn't confirm, The sighting included detailed accounts of object movements and courses, No clear photographs were associated with the sightings despite some documentation indicating that photos were taken.
witness description: Civilians near the Savannah River Plant
